data.name: InterVar
data.description: A bioinformatics software tool for clinical interpretation of genetic variants by the 2015 ACMG-AMP guideline

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "3. You need download other files such as mim2gene.txt from [OMIM](http://www.omim.org/downloads)."
"InterVar is a python script for variant interpretation of clinical significance."

"InterVar takes either pre-annotated files, or unannotated input files in VCF format or ANNOVAR input format... In the output... each variant will be assigned as 'pathogenic', 'likely pathogenic', 'uncertain significance', 'likely benign' or 'benign'"
